name: RateMyPSUProfessors
description: An extension that grabs a professors ratings from RateMyProfessors.com and displays them as you search for classes.
author: Ricardo Valencia

scripts.build: npm run build:extension & npm run build:background
scripts.build:extension: browserify src/extension.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o app/dist/extension.min.js
scripts.build:background: browserify src/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o app/dist/background.min.js
